author: m.kalinin
content: We haven't had a time to go through https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/321 last call. We're going to get back to this proposal on CL call this week (https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/660#issuecomment-1313920711). Take a look if you have a time, everyone's input is very much appreciated.

author: timbeiko
content:
We didn’t cover this on the last ACD, but would anyone here oppose announcing the deprecation of Ropsten for something like late December? 

We’ve mentioned in the past a few times it will shut down “by EOY”, and so I think it’d be good to put out another post about this. Again, unless someone sees a strong reason not to.

author: ajsutton
content: I think the big question is whether it will survive that long. It's already down to 38% validator participation...
